message.body: /me assumes you are learning the backup-always-before-upgrading on the hard way :-(
so ugly, you can't look into the mirror in the morning
well, the one I gave you was the one with 1210 as version number, before the next version (1231?) there were a few more commits
but I think older versions will surely run better than newer commits
well, if RAM stays low like that, and no freezes:
you have to merge each newer commit one by one, let run ZN for let's say 30 mins, to see if the bug reappears
then we'd know which commit(s) causeit
would also be a proof that it's indeed by ZN, and not something from your VPS
in the end it's all interplay of many things, but chances are higher than that newer ZN commit is involved
in the bug
je sais :-(
mais le problem est: tu dois sure ou est le bug, parce que autre-wise: tu ne peut pas upgrader dans le future
or talk with @nofish, I told him shortly on irc about it
but I guess he'd also need some "proof" it's really caused by the newer ZN
I mean the lazy approach could also be:
wait 1 week until some more changes done, perhaps th ebug gets fixed by chance ;-)
oh, again ? :-(
then it must be something else than ZN
what happens when: 1. you stop the webserver
2. so no people can access it
3. but let run ZN normally
to see if someone is doing malicious stuff with your vps
telepathy :-)
would I look at this time of night prettier when I would use it ?
meaning: why are you asking ?
we can also talk over tox, no need to post in public details of your server stuff
you can still access mail@zeroverse ? then I will send there my tox id
or so ;-)
invalid ID
let me send mine via mail@zeroverse
you are reall ypersistent in putting stuff into public ;-)
well, I sent you a request

@redacted@zv I had sent you after our chat here a few more mails (to each), did they arrive by now? Also: your mails never reached me. And since I couldn't open your blog, I assume you are an JZA case
corr: assumed
so, I didn't investigate more. until I get feedback
a user with that name, who had some trouble making his stuff reach others
initially I saw your mails to erkan@zeroid.bit, but the ones you said sent later, they never arrived
"stuff" being his ZN sites
yes, it works now, because I feeded into the seeder
so, that's why I thought your network setup may involve something special (because also the later maisl did not arrive here)
so, let's check both: 1. do you see in your redacted@zeroid.bit one mails from two of my accounts ? I sent alsways with a descriptive title to distinguish
2. this you clarified: "I still see no messages in my mail.zeroverse.bit inbox when logged in as redacted@zeroverse.bit."
3. I have no mails by you to both of my accounts. though you said you sent, and we saw that the size in your dirs increased
"well, I'm using tor" ok, me also. so, that would sound good, since we are "same"
about 3: could you send 1 mail again to erkan@zeroid.bit so we know that sending emails actually works. You'd get a prompt reply back
@redacted@zv yeah, pretty strange. I can see that the bot replied to the correct address (where it came from)
yeah, I made this different now: I just used redacted (not redacted@something)
@roguehat@zid will add your blog to the list
did both mails come to there, or only one ?
/me sent from two accounts to your zv address
twister, perhaps not used for long time ? then it gets all at once ?
@redacted@zv I have now blocked your zeroid account at mail@ZV, can you log out there and check if something arrives at your redacted@ZV ?
(ideally I should have deleted your data dir before, but I didn't know if you have important stuff there, so I am waiting for that)
done, perhaps you should also delete the dir on your end? do you have the dir name, or shall I send to you here or on tox ?
I think the most important is to delete the zeroid-dir on your end, since I saw in the sign/publish here that the data-dirs of each user are ignore in that sign/publish.
@redacted@zv just sent you fresh mail, let's see if those arrive (and I guess you won't be able to log in, since you are blocked, but don't try that now)
and, in case you see no mail, send me one mail from where you are logged in, please

yes
good question. I only see the error message
yes, I saw your 2 new posts and went to your blog
back, but waits, until you got finished with your investigation
ah, wait, I know what you mean now ;-)
actually, you have no data/users/something
indeed
did you change initially your data/users/content.json ?
that one has to be signed + ublished separately
ok, progress then :-)
well, no one knows, and everyone makes that mistake (when wanting to change limits)
pressing f5: no errors msg there anymore
ok, just posted a test, to be sure also
(I mean I commented on your initial blog post, as test)
yea, 0net is specific to chat only
